data.title: Kamal Haasan movies list
data.text:
List of All Kamal Haasan Movies

Key

Ma Malayalam

Te Telugu

Ka Kannada

Hi Hindi

Be Bengali

All other movies are in Tamil

A (26 movies) Aadu Puli Aatam (1977) Aakhri Sangraam (1984) (Hi) : With Rajini and Sridevi Aanandam Paramaanandam (1977) (Ma) Aanandha Jyothi (1960) Aasheerwaadam (1976) (Ma) Aboorva Raagangal : Kamal's 1st movie as hero Aboorva Sagotharargal (1989) : Dual role of dwarf and normal fella Adyapadam (1977) (Ma) Agni Saatchi : Kamal plays himself ! Agnipusham (1976) (Ma) Akkale Rajyam (1980) (Te) Alaauddinum Arpuda Vilakkum : Last film with Rajini as costar Amavasya Chandrudu (Te) Andha Oru Nimidam Andhamaina Anubhavam (1979) Annai Velankanni : Acted as Jesus Christ Antharangam (1975) : Sang his first song Anthuleni Katha (1975) (Te) Anumodhanam (Ma) Appoppan (1975) (Ma) Arangetram Aruthu (1976) (Ma) Aval Appadi Dhaan : With Rajini and Sripriya Aval Oru Thodarkathai (1975) Avargal (1977) : Plays a ventriquolist Avvai Shanmugi (1996) : Plays a 60 yr old woman ! Azhiyaadha Kolangal B (1 movie) Benki Alli Aralida Huvu (1983) (Ka) C (2 movies) Chachi 420 (1998) : Hindi remake of Avvai Shanmugi Chanakyan (1990) (Ma) Cinema Paithiyam D (4 movies) Daisy (1988) (Ma) Dekha Pyaar Tumhaara (1985) (Hi) Devar Magan (1992) : Plays 'Sivaji' Ganesan's son ! Donga Dhora (Te) E (7 movies) Eettu (1978) (Ma) Ek Duje Ke Liye (Hi) : Remake of Maro Charitra (Te) Ek Nayi Paheli (1983) (Hi) : Remake of Aboorva Raagangal Ellam Inba mayam Ennakul Oruvan (1984) Erra Gulaabi (Te) Ezhavadhu Naal F (0 movies) G (5 movies) Giraftaar (1985) (Hi) : with Amitabh ! Gnanninne Premikkunnu (1975) (Ma) Gumaasthaavin Magal (1974) Guna (1991) Guru (1980) H (1 movie) Hare Raadha Hare Krishna I (5 movies) Idhi Kadha Kaadhu (Te) Ilamai Oonjaladugiradhu (1978) Indrudu Chandrudu (1990) (Te) Indian (1996) : Double role as father and son Iravil Oru Pagal J (1 movie) Japanil Kalayanaraaman : sequel to Kalyanaraman K (18 movies) Kaadal Parisu (1986) Kaaki Sattai (1985) Kabita (1977) (Be) : Kamal's only Bong film Kadal Meengal Kadamai Ganniyam Kattupaadu Kalaignyan (1993) Kalathoor Kannamma (1960) : Kamal's 1st film. Child Actor Kalyaana Maalai Kalyana Raman Kanna Nalama (1972) Kanni Vetri Kanyakumari (1978) (Ma) Kappal Otiya Thamizhan Katharina Nimisham (1978) (Ma) Kokila Kurathi Magan : First film not as child artiste Kurudhi Punal (1995) : Remake of Drohkaal (Hindi) Kuttavum Shikshayum (1976) L (1 movie) Lalitha (1983) M (24 movies) Maalai Soodava (1975) Maanavan (1969?) : Appears in 1 dance sequence !! Madhanol Savam (Ma) Madhuraswapnam (1976) (Ma) Magalir Mattum (1994) Mahanadhi (1994) Maharaasan (1993) Manakkanakku (1986) : Guest role Mangala Vadhyam (1979) Mangamma Sabatham (1985) Manmadha Leelai Maria My Darling Maro Ahalya Maro Charithira (Te) : Original of Ek Duje Ke Liye Matthoru Seetha (1975) (Ma) Mattuvin Chattangale (1982) Meendum Kokila Melnaatu Marumagal Michael Madhana- (1990) : Quadruple roles !

Kaama Raajan Mogam Muppadhu Varusham Moondram Pirai (1983) : National Best Actor Award Moondru Mudichu (1976) Muradan (1983) (Ma) My Dear Marthandan (1990) : guest role N (17 movies) Naa Pere Durga Nagamohini (Te) Naam Pirandha Mann (1977) Naan Avan Illai (1974) Naanum Oru Thozhilaali (1986) Nakshathiram (1979) Nammavar (1994) Nanban Nandri, Meendum Varuga (1982) : plays himself !
